Package edu.sru.thangiah.datastructures.search.minimax

Class Board

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.datastructures.search.minimax.Board
public class Board extends Object

Title: Board/p>

Description:

Board class for the tic tac toe game Handles scoring for minimax based on the board Minimax is an artificial intelligence decision making algorithm popular in game theory. The objective is to find the optimal move in a given state. Minimax contains a maximizer and a minimizer. The maximizer bases moves on a greedy approach which achieves the highest score, while the minimizer attempts to get the lowest score possible. Backtracking is used in a tree like data structure to navigate through all potential action states and determine which optimizes the given goal.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam R. Thangiah
